EmailTemplate.subject: YETI | Buy Now Ship Immediately
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
BUY NOW
AVAILABLE TO SHIP IMMEDIATELY FOR FALL/WINTER 2017
Please see attached sheet for Fall/Winter 2017. Please note that all Limited Edition Pink products are sold out. We do have a limited amout of Limited Edition High Country Tundra 45 available. Now is your last chance to order all other products for the 2017 Holiday Season.
Please email POs/orders to {!User.Email} and sales@yeti.com
